title: The New Love Boat - The Newlyweds/The Exchange/Cleo's First Voyage
The Captain and the Lady/One If by Land/Centerfold
description: The Captain's ex-wife who is now married to one of the cruise lines executives comes on board and is walking all over him and he's letting her. A woman who's engaged to a politician upon learning that a nude photo she had taken years ago is coming out in a magazine tries to make sure he doesn't see it. And a woman who wants to get married but her boyfriend who just wants things to stay as they are follows her wherever the ships docks.

title: A Tasteful Affair/Oh, Dale!/The Main Event
description: When the girlfriend of a guy named Dale who's materialistic decides to go on the cruise with a guy she just met, who drives an expensive car. He tries to get on the cruise but the only available slot can only given to a woman. So he dons a dress and pretends to be a woman named Dale. He shares the cabin with a woman who's just been dumped at the altar. A couple who are constantly bickering find themselves stuck in a elevator. A married woman who decides she needs sometime apart from her husband so she goes on the cruise alone. What she doesn't know is that her husband has hired a P.I. to keep tabs on her. The man tries to keep a low profile but some of the passengers whom the woman befriended brings them together and they hit it off.

title: Ex Plus Y/Golden Agers/Graham and Kelly
Message for Maureen/Gotcha/Acapulco Connection
Isaac the Groupie/Mr. Popularity/Help! Murder!
The Joker Is Mild/Take My Granddaughter, Please/First Time Out
description: Ruth Gordon is the meddling grandmother to exasperated Patty Duke Astin and she is determined to marry off her granddaughter and quickly. Am old and forgotten comedian asks a favor of crew director Julie to put him in the show as a favor to her dad who he assisted once. Four college buddies are on deck and they are kidding and placing bets as to whether the one who is a virgin will be able to change his status before the ship docks back in San Pedro.

title: Julie's Old Flame/The Jinx/The Identical Problem
description: Ellen and Helen are identical twins with only one ticket so they've planned it out courtesy of an alarm wrist watch so that only one of them is out of the room. This causes confounding and perplexing situations for Doc as Helen comes on to him while her twin spurns him creating some hilarious scenes. Julie's old heartthrob is on the cruise by himself and as charming as she remembered but he was married at the time. And a delightful old couple who were married and survived their cruise on the Titanic are thought to be a jinx according to the old wive's tale as told by Gopher as strange things begin to happen to crew members one by one.

title: Lost and Found/The Understudy/Married Singles
description: An young boy pays for his cruise with his paper route money and neglects to tell his parents at home he's booked his ticket and is on board. A wife cannot release the pain of their eight-year-old son's death. Julie is training a pretty, vivacious cruise director trainee who will stop at nothing to get Julie's job. Who can and will stop her?

title: The Captain's Captain/Romance Roulette/Hounded (A Dog's Life)
description: When the Captain's father comes on board, he drives his son nuts that he asks the crew to run interference. He then meets one of the crew's staff and takes a liking to her. A passenger finds himself trapped in is cabin when an attack dog comes on board and gets in his cabin and won't let him out. And three women who were friends decide to play a game wherein they get a guy to say a word and if he says it they should hook up with that guy. And one of them, gets the ship's repairman to say it.

title: Dear Beverly/The Strike/Special Delivery
Lonely at the Top/Silent Night/Divorce Me, Please
The Old Man and the Runaway/The Painters/A Fine Romance
description: Will Geer is pitch perfect as the irascible old gentleman who finds a fifteen-year-old girl who is a stowaway in his bathroom. There is lots of banter between he and the scamp Bayn Johnson. One of Julie's brother's friends, is looked at with interest by Julie, no longer a young scamp herself with braces. His cabin mate is an older Lothario urging him to put the moves on Julie. Julie arranges two "professional" painters to paint the Captain's suite to his favorite longed-for color Singapor Sunset Saffron. to.

title: Too Hot to Handle/Family Reunion/Cinderella Story
Isaac's Double Standard/One More Time/Chimpanzeeshines
description: While Isaac's girlfriend comes on board to spend sometime with him so does his mother. And he's shocked to see that she's traveling with someone and doesn't approve. And Julie books a divorced couple of entertainers who can't get along but have to when Julie tells them that one of them will have to pay their passage if they don't perform. And Gopher brings on board a chimpanzee who goes around pilfering things but brings him in contact with a girl who just had a nose job and is hesitant to remove the bandage.

title: The Eyes of Love/Masquerade/Hollywood Royalty/The Caper: Part 1
description: A husband and wife as a famous Hollywood couple arrive with paparazzi. She is adorned in a famous gigantic diamond which, of course, entices a dim-witted bumbling crooks in a delightful caper reminiscent of old Hollywood. A husband is chagrined into bringing his wife on the cruise when he finds the tickets for his mistress and himself with some unexpected surprises. A masquerade night moves the plots right along.

title: The Eyes of Love/Masquerade/Hollywood Royalty/The Caper: Part 2
description: The bumbling gang of thieves believe they have finally figured out a way to nab the elusive diamond even as its owner comes to her own drastic decision on its fate; A blind woman wonders if she can be happy with a former blind friend who has regained his sight; and a man's wife and mistress discover who each other are.

title: Winner Take Love/The Congressman Was Indiscreet/Isaac's History Lesson
Last of the Stubings/Million Dollar Man/The Sisters
description: Stubing's nephew comes on board to be trained to work on ships like everyone in their family but doesn't exactly do a good job at whatever he is told to do. Eventually he reveals a secret to the crew that he can't tell Stubing. A man who stole a million dollars hooks up with a female passenger but when he reveals what he did she reveals that she's a cop and intends to turn him in when they return. Two sisters compete for the same man.

title: A Very Special Girl/Until the Last Goodbye/The Inspector
description: A Russian man goes around repeating the same phrase. Two girlfriends cruise, and one is ignored by all the men on board. The staff tries to figure out which passenger is the Princess Cruise Line inspector.

title: Memories of You/Computerman/Parlez Vous?
description: Two American women pose as French to get men and gifts. A Valentines Day cruise brings a computer matchmaking service on board. A case of amnesia plagues one passenger.

title: Taking Sides/Going by the Book/A Friendly Little Game
description: An old married couple turns newlyweds against one another with their bickering. A man counting cards cheats the crew out of their emergency fund.

title: A Selfless Love/The Nubile Nurse/Parents Know Best
description: A young man's parents are determined to have him date other women on the cruise and not settle on marrying "Ginger" who is not on board. A man is having second thoughts about age differences in marrying a woman 21 years younger. A new nurse is on staff for the cruise who is a pretty ex-showgirl. Of course, Doc is hitting on her, and a bit frustrated when she does not return his advances.

title: Musical Cabins
description: A spunky reporter is aboard to write an expose of lust on the high seas. A man has one week to marry or lose his inheritance. A woman moves out of her chauvinist fianc√©'s cabin. A suburban widow impersonates a glamorous Hollywood socialite.

title: The Business of Love/Crash Diet Crush/I'll Never Fall in Love Again
description: A former prostitute is harassed by an unhappy, married client who threatens to expose her. Captain Stubing crash diets for a high school flame who no longer sees him as String Bean Stubing. Two depressed widowers find comfort in each other.

title: Pacific Princess Overtures/Gopher, the Rebel/Cabin Fever
description: Gopher is fed up with Stubbing always ordering him around. He meets a girl who's a bit of a rebel and encourages him to stand up to Stubbing and it ends with Gopher getting fired. A businesswoman comes on board and also a man who wants to buy her company whom she is constantly turning him down. So he sends his associate who tries to charm her. He shows her an invention of his which his boss doesn't think is worth anything. And a guy who is married goes on the cruise with his girlfriend and she begins to wonder where are they going in their relationship.

title: Marooned/The Search/Isaac's Holiday: Part 1
description: Isaac who's on vacation, decides to go on the cruise as a passenger. And he acts like a jerk and hooks up with another passenger and doesn't tell her what he does. And among the other passengers is a woman who is searching for her birth mother who is on the cruise, she goes to see her but is too afraid to. She meets another passenger and they hit it off. And a rich girl who just got dumped is very mean and Doc sets out to help her. And a couple who are in a rut and are considering separating. And an old woman, who is not all there. And Stubing's Deputy Captain, is there to be groomed for when he's made Captain but he's a bit incompetent. When he gets a message that thee's a hurricane coming, he's suppose to give it to Stubing but runs into the old woman who is lost and uses it to draw her a map and she takes it with her and he forgets about the message. Stubing decides to go to an island and the rich girl, the couple and old lady join him along with Doc, Gopher and Julie. But when they get there, there's a man who holds them captive.

title: Marooned/The Search/Isaac's Holiday: Part 2
description: The Captain and his marooned group struggle to survive on the island during a hurricane; the woman looking for her lost mother makes a startling discovery; and Isaac tries to save the boat while regaining Mara's trust.

title: Rocky/Julie's Dilemma/Who's Who?
The Man Who Loved Women/A Different Girl/Oh, My Aching Brother
description: A womanizer hits on three women and they're all taken with him. But what he doesn't know is that they're friends and traveling together. Tha Captain's nephew brings his wife on the cruise for a belated honeymoon because he was called to military service and was away for two years. And two brothers who come on board to sue the cruise line by having one of them fake an injury. The crew suspects he's faking but unless they can get him to stand up they're at their mercy. And the one pretending to be injured is attracted to a passenger.

title: Where Is It Written?/Julie's Aunt/The Big Deal
Mike and Ike/The Witness/The Kissing Bandit
description: A meek guy dons a mask and goes out kissing every girl on the ship. But he meets a girl whom he connects with. A couple who are friends of Isaac's whom he performed with on the streets, are now successful and rich and have a young son. But his father spends more time on work than with his son. And a woman follows a guy whom she knows witnessed what happened to someone she cares about and urges him to come forward.

title: Ship of Ghouls
A Time for Everything/The Song Is Ended/Accidental Cruise/Anoushka
Till Death Do Us Part-Maybe/Locked Away/Chubs
description: A widow who still hasn't gotten over her husband's death goes on the cruise and is followed by her husband's ghost who tries to fix her up with another passenger. A divorced couple sees their daughter and her husband off but get locked in one of the unused cabins. And Gopher's sister comes on board and makes a beeline for doc.

title: Man of the Cloth/Her Own Two Feet/Tony's Family
Heads or Tails/Mona of the Movies/The Little People
description: Two buddies make a bet - for a pizza - to see who can date Julie. A man hopes to romance his matin√©e idol crush, but he is intimidated and they seem to have repeated bad timing. A young man brings his parents on board for their 25th wedding anniversary and he runs into a girl from home to whom he is attracted. The problem is that his parents are little people and the young woman inadvertently reveals that little people make her uncomfortable.

title: The Captain's Cup/The Folks from Home/Legal Eagle
El Kid/The Last Hundred Bucks/Isosceles Triangle
Julie Falls Hard/Double Wedding/The Dummies
description: Julie falls in love. Will she leave the ship for Alaska? Twins, unhappy with their perspective spouses, switch places. Four bickering dummies entertain the ship passengers.

title: My Sister, Irene/The 'Now' Marriage/Second Time Around
description: Irene Austin agrees to meet college classmate Andy Hopkins after 40 years, then panics and tells him she's Irene's sister; Dr. Todd Gardiner wrote a book about open marriage, but finds his own in danger; Doc's ex appears with a new fianc√©.

title: Gopher's Opportunity/The Switch/Home Sweet Home
description: Gopher considers leaving the ship for the chance to manage a hotel; a magician's brother falls in love with his assistant.

title: Second Chance/Don't Push Me/Like Father, Like Son
description: A father and son compete for the same woman; Isaac worries that a young woman on probation has stolen some jewelry; a henpecked man feels he's being pressured into marriage against his will.

title: Alas, Poor Dwyer/After the War/Itsy Bitsy/Ticket to Ride/Disco Baby: Part 1
Alas, Poor Dwyer/After the War/Itsy Bitsy/Ticket to Ride/Disco Baby: Part 2
Best of Friends/Aftermath/Dream Boat
A Good and Faithful Servant/The Secret Life of Burl Smith/Tug of War/Designated Lover
Love Me, Love My Dog/Poor Little Rich Girl/The Decision
description: A newly rich woman isn't sure if her boyfriend loves her or her money; a man is interested in a woman but her dog doesn't like him; Isaac falls for a woman who's engaged.

title: A Funny Valentine/The Wallflower/Home is Not a Home
Ages of Man/Bo 'n Sam/Families
description: Attracted to an older man, Julie discovers she is being pursed by a teen with a crush./Bo and Sam break a ship model meant for the captain's party and work to fix it in time./A couple tries to find common ground between their parents.

title: Murder on the High Seas/Sounds of Silence/Cyrano de Bricker
April's Return/Super Mom/I'll See You Again
Third Wheel/Grandmother's Day/Second String Mom
Buddy and Portia's Story/Julie's Story/Carol and Doug's Story/Peter and Alicia's Story: Part 1
Buddy and Portia's Story/Julie's Story/Carol and Doug's Story/Peter and Alicia's Story: Part 2
The Grass Is Always Greener/Three Stages of Love/Oldies But Goodies
Going My Way/Dance with Me/Doc, Be Patient
The Audit Couple/The Scoop/My Boyfriend's Back
description: And IRS agent comes on board to audit Stubing. Now she's so uptight, Julie tells the Captain to try and get her to loosen up. Which leads to a misunderstanding which is worse than being audited. A female celebrity comes on board. A tabloid reporter follows her because he thinks she's meeting someone. Possibly a secret lover. And a newly wed whose on her honeymoon discovers her ex is on the cruise and is trying to get her back.

title: Gopher's Greatest Hits/The Vacation/One Rose a Day
Crew Confessions/Haven't I Seen You?/Reunion
Cindy/Play by Play/What's a Brother For?
Never Say Goodbye/New Woman, A/Trial Romance
The Critical Success/The Love Lamp Is Lit/Take My Boy Friend, Please/Rent a Family/The Man in Her Life: Part 1
The Critical Success/The Love Lamp Is Lit/Take My Boy Friend, Please/Rent a Family/The Man in Her Life: Part 2
The Brotherhood of the Sea/Letter to Babycakes/Daddy's Pride
Not Now, I'm Dying/Eleanor's Return/Too Young to Love
description: A woman whom Stubbing likes comes on board and before he could make a move she hooks up with another man. A friend of Doc's comes on board with her boyfriend. Now she wants a commitment but they guy keeps on making excuses to the point of faking an illness. Doc tries to help her by calling his bluff but discovers he is sick. And an underage couple comes on board for... The girl's father who's an exec of the line tells Stubbing to make sure nothing happens between them. And Stubbing lays that task on Gopher.

title: The Stimulation of Stephanie/The Next Step/Life Begins at 40
The Spider Serenade/Next Door Wife/The Harder They Fall
Doc's 'Ex' Change/The Gift/Making the Grade
April's Love/Happy Ending/We Three
The Kinfolk/Sis and the Slicker/Moonlight and Moonshine/Too Close for Comfort/The Affair: Part 1
The Kinfolk/Sis and the Slicker/Moonlight and Moonshine/Too Close for Comfort/The Affair: Part 2
Rent a Romeo/Matchmaker, Matchmaker/Y' Gotta Have Heart
The Remake/The Perfect Match/The Captain's Ne'er Do Well Brother
Not So Fast, Gopher/Haven't We Met Before?/Foreign Exchange
Another Time, Another Place/Doctor Who/Gopher's Engagement
Dumb Luck/Tres Amigos/Hey, Jealous Lover
Celebration/Captain Papa/Honeymoon Pressure
Vicki's First Love/The High Cost of Loving/Accident Prone
Invisible Maniac/September Song/Peekaboo
description: Isaac finds a former school friend is trying to use him to make her husband jealous/Cathy's concern is getting in the way of committing to Tom/Fay Piermont wants to liven up her marriage.

title: No Girls for Doc/Marriage of Convenience/The Caller/The Witness
Sergeant Bull/Friends and Lovers/Miss Mother
The Family Plan/The Promoter/May the Best Man Win/Forever Engaged/The Judges: Part 1
The Family Plan/The Promoter/May the Best Man Win/Forever Engaged/The Judges: Part 2
Target Gopher/The Major's Wife/Strange Honeymoon/The Oilman Cometh
The Mallory Quest/Julie, the Vamp/The Offer: Part 1
The Mallory Quest/Julie, the Vamp/The Offer: Part 2
The Horse Lover/Secretary to the Stars/Julie's Decision/Gopher and Isaac Buy a Horse/Village People Ride Again

roles.char: Himself - Hard Hat from the Village People
Himself - Indian from the Village People
Himself - Leatherman from the Village People
Himself - Soldier from the Village People
Himself - Cop from the Village People
Himself - Cowboy from the Village People

title: Tell Her She's Great/Matchmaker, Matchmaker Times Two/The Baby Alarm
description: Two sets of parents try to get their children together. And the children are fed with them pushing them together that they decide to do something. But it blows up in their faces. A single mother looking for a guy will only date someone whom her baby likes. And Isaac's aunt and uncle come on board and her aunt who fancies herself an actress, performs and Isaac asks them to praise her and in doing so she decides to pursue it which means she will leave her husband.

title: She Stole His Heart/Return of the Captain's Brother/Swag and Mag
description: A kleptomaniac meets a psychiatrist who tries to help her but when they fall for each other, the psychiatrist keeps his distance. A television star comes on board and Vicki who adores him expects him to be like his character but is not. And the Captain's brother comes on the cruise to introduce the woman he is going to marry to the Captain. But a woman whom he was involved with follows and tries to woo him back to her and he finds it hard to resist her.

title: Boomerang/Captain's Triangle/Out of This World
description: A woman whom Stubing knows comes on board with her husband but is feeling neglected so he turns to him. A woman who wants to keep guys from hitting on her puts on a wedding ring. And a scientist thinks a woman is an alien and convinces Gopher of it who freaks out.

title: That's My Dad/The Captain's Bird/Captive Audience
Frugal Pair, The/Doc's Dismissal/The Girl Next Door
Isaac's Teacher/Seal of Approval/The Successor
Trigamist, The/Jealousy/From Here to Maternity
First Voyage, Last Voyage/April the Ninny/The Loan Arranger
Gopher's Bride/Love with a Married Man/Not Tonight, Jack!
Lose One, Win One/The $10,000 Lover/Mind My Wife
Isaac and the Mermaids/Humpty, Dumpty/Aquaphobic
Return of the Ninny/Touchdown Twins/Split Personality
Quiet, My Wife's Listening/Eye of the Beholder/The Nudist from Sunshine Gardens
Black Sheep/Hometown Doc/Clothes Make the Girl
description: Isaac's uncle who's not exactly been an upstanding guy comes on board. And a government agent tells the Captain that he is following Isaac's uncle he thinks he's involved in something that's not exactly legal. A member of the crew is attracted to a passenger but her mother is hoping she can snag a wealthy man. So he borrows another passenger's clothes and pretends to be a man of means. And a guy from Doc's hometown whom he helped send to medical school so that their hometown can have a doctor comes on board to introduce Doc to his fianc√©e and tells him that he's not going to practice in their hometown. So Doc decides to resign and be the doctor of his hometown.

title: I Love You Too, Smith/Mamma and Me/Sally's Paradise
The Duel/Two for Julie/Aunt Hilly

roles.char: Carlos Jose Ramon Raul Sebastian Battista Ramirez

title: Vicki and the Gambler/Love with a Skinny Stranger/That Old Gang of Mine
Model Marriage, A/This Year's Model/Original Sin/Vogue Rogue/Too Clothes for Comfort: Part 1
Model Marriage, A/This Year's Model/Original Sin/Vogue Rogue/Too Clothes for Comfort: Part 2
Maid for Each Other/Lost and Found/Then There Were Two
Tony and Julie/Separate Beds/America's Sweetheart
description: Julie has a run in with a guy who turns out to be a passenger and they butt heads. A young actress comes on board and makes a fool of Vicki. And an estranged husband and wife,one of whom is neat freak and the other a slob find themselves not only on the ship but in the same cabin.

title: Expedition, The/Julie's Wedding/The Mongala/Julie's Replacement/The Three R's/The Professor's Wife: Part 1
Expedition, The/Julie's Wedding/The Mongala/Julie's Replacement/The Three R's/The Professor's Wife: Part 2
Two Grapes on the Vine/Aunt Sylvia/Deductible Divorce
Incredible Hunk, The/Isaac, the Marriage Counselor/Jewels & Jim
description: A guy whom Julie booked to entertain the passengers, is a male stripper. He's also a teacher and runs into the head of the PTA and tries to keep her from seeing him perform. A guy whose wife just left comes on board and is suicidal. Isaac tries to help by calling his wife but she refuses to talk to him. So Isaac tries to set him up with some girls but his wife shows up. And the Captain recognizes one of the passengers as a known jewel thief. And when someone's jewels are stolen the Captain suspects him.

title: Country Blues/Daddy's Little Girl/Jackpot
Chef's Special/Beginning Anew/Kleinschmidt
The Lady from Laramie/Vicki Swings/Phantom Bride
Farnsworth's Fling/Three in a Bed/I Remember Helen/Merrill, Melanie & Melanesia/Gopher Farnsworth Smith: Part 1
description: The crew is in Australia to work on one of the cruise lines ships based there. And a wealthy man named Fransworth has decided to invite his whole family for a reunion. But in actuality he wants to see who among them he should keep in his will. And among the them is his niece, Marcia who is not exactly fond of him because she believes that because of him her father became penniless. And she brings along a friend, Jessica, who has a knack of getting wealthy men to marry her. And he asks his niece, Jenny and her husband, Bud to come but they're divorced so they have to pretend that they're still married. But when her boyfriend calls, he comes on-board and refuses to leave and when he's told there no more cabins, he stays with them. And Farnsworth's secretary and niece, Eloise gets him a replacement valet, Wayne who's not exactly what he's use to. And Wayne and Eloise get close. Stubbing meets the daughter of an old flame, Melanie. And when he as to go, she decides to join him and he keeps his distance cause he can't seem to tell her from her late mother. And Julie can't help but think about Tony, the guy she nearly married but chose not to because he was dying.

title: Farnsworth's Fling/Three in a Bed/I Remember Helen/Merrill, Melanie & Melanesia/Gopher Farnsworth Smith: Part 2
Love, Honor, and Obey/Gladys and Agnes/Radioactive Isaac
He's My Brother/Zeke and Zelda/Teach Me Tonight
description: Two stowaways pretend to be another couple, and they start charging things not knowing that the crew members who approve them will have to pay for what they charge. A woman meets the author of a book she's reading. And Doc's brother comes on board and has a lot of pent up resentment for him.

title: Take a Letter, Vicki/The Floating Bridge Game/The Joy of Celibacy
Doc Take the Fifth/Safety Last/A Business Affair
description: Doc arrives back from holidays and introduces his new wife of a couple of hours to the crew. Don Adams is a Safety Investigator on holidays but finds danger around every corner on board the ship. The president of a financial group comes aboard to talk his female VP out of resigning due to untrue rumors about them having an affair.

title: Good Neighbors/Captain's Portrait/Familiar Faces
description: Two passengers meet during the boarding and although attracted to one another, they find they live at the same address and the lady has a rule about dating someone who lives in her own apartment building. The Captain is to greet a famous female artist aboard who has been commissioned by the ship line to paint his portrait. A romance begins and the artist decides to paint an unconventional portrait of the captain, naked, and from memory. When a couple on their honeymoon board, an older passenger vaguely recognizes the younger man's face, but can't recall where he knows him from. The young honeymooner knows exactly where they first met, but denies knowing the older man.

title: I Don't Play Anymore/Gopher's Roomate/Crazy for You
description: Gopher thinks he knows a female passenger but just can't remember from where. And when she reveals how they know each other shocks him. And a man who feigned being mentally ill so that he could get his full pension is being followed by a woman who tasked with proving he's faking. And a concert pianist who has stopped playing because he has arthritis is being pestered by some fans to play. Initially he refuses but upon meeting one of the ship's staff who needs an operation, he offers to play.

title: Green, But Not Jolly/Past Perfect Love/Instant Family
The Return of the Captain's Lady/Love Ain't Illegal/The Irresistible Man
description: And old flame of the Captain's returns for a cruise. As the captain prepares to propose, Doc and Isaac find news which will cause the Captain some distress. Two business partners and their secretary join the cruise to celebrate winning a large contract. One partner is not as honest as he seems and tries to use his secretary's love for him to cover his under-handed tricks. In an attempt to get attention from a woman he cares for, a passenger reports that he's been sexually attacked by an unknown female passenger in a darkened hall closet.

title: His Girls Friday/A Wife for Wilfred/The Girl Who Stood Still
description: A businessman takes his prissy secretary on a business trip. When he meets a dizzy blonde, his problem is how does he get his secretary to quit, so he can hire the blonde. Wilfred offers the crew $10,000 if they can find him a pretty wife. He's soon surrounded by five beautiful women, all fighting for his attention, and the crew trying to win a quick ten grand. Two childhood sweethearts separated since school meet up on the cruise. How does the girl tell her old boyfriend that she now lives with a back brace due to a spine disease.

title: New York, A.C./Live It Up/All's Fair in Love and War
The Musical/My Ex-Mom/The Show Must Go On/The Pest/My Aunt, the Worrier: Part 1
The Musical/My Ex-Mom/The Show Must Go On/The Pest/My Aunt, the Worrier: Part 2
Pride of the Pacific/The Viking's Son/Separate Vacations/The Experiment/Getting to Know You: Part 1
Pride of the Pacific/The Viking's Son/Separate Vacations/The Experiment/Getting to Know You: Part 2
Isaac Gets Physical/She Brought Her Mother Along/Cold Feet
description: A nurse comes on board to give the crew their company physical but Isaac tries to avoid her cause there's a congenital condition in his family that he fears could jeopardize his job. And the nurse is attracted to him also. A young woman who's dating an older man brings her mother to meet him. And when she does, she discovers that he's her old boyfriend. And Julie's cousin comes on board with his girlfriend and tells her he wants to dump her because she's "nice"; "very nice".

title: Burl of My Dreams/Meet the Author/Rhymes, Riddles, and Romance
Pal-I-Mony-O-Mine/Does Father Know Best?/An 'A' for Gopher
April in Boston/Saving Grace/Breaks of Life
A Dress to Remember
description: This story follows a dress and how it affects three people. First a model who's trying out a new diet program, who is suppose to wear it to show how much weight she lost and it's been designed to fit her after losing the weight. She's starving and she meets a guy who unknown to her is the former partner of the doctor whose diet she's following. He gets her to try his program which has her eating candy bars among other things. And a woman who sells flowers on the dock, freaks out because the daughter she hasn't seen for 20 years comes on board to see her. She tells the Captain that she told her that she a woman of means and asks him to tell her she's not on the ship. But the Captain tells her she is and tells the woman she's coming on the cruise and the Captain lets her wear the dress when she meets her daughter. And a guy whom Doc knows comes on board to try and win her back his wife, because she caught him in a compromising position and threw him out. When he learns that her father who wants to kill him is with her, he gets it and wears it so that her father won't recognize him. And Gopher and Isaac are frantic because they're suppose to take care of the dress for the model.

title: Mothers Don't Do That/Marrying for Money/Substitute Lover
description: When a man comes on board with his new (young) wife, Gopher knows the man is rich and he and Isaac wonder if she married him for his money. And they suspect she could be trying to get rid of him so she can have it. A woman takes her son whom he sees very little of with her to try to reconnect but when he sees her diary, he just wants to get away from her. A woman comes on board to meet her pen pal. A guy Julie knows is taken with her and when she refuses his invitation because she wants to meet her pen pal, he decides to pretend to be her pen pal when he learns that he's not coming.

title: Venetian Love Song/Down for the Count/Arrividerci, Gopher/The Arrangement: Part 1
description: The crew goes to Italy to work on a cruise ship there. Among the passengers is a family whose patriarch and matriarch originally came from Italy and accompanying them are their 2 daughters and grand daughter. Into the trip the couple bicker to the point that they're considering separating. One of the daughters is meeting someone on a sort of blind date but not known to her is a gigolo. And the grand daughter who's been promised to another guy back home meets a local and is attracted to him. And Gopher meets a local woman who says he reminds her of someone she knows. While on shore the man who's the spitting image of Gopher grabs and assumes his identity.

title: Venetian Love Song/Down for the Count/Arrividerci, Gopher/The Arrangement: Part 2
The Anniversary Gift/Honey Bee Mine/Bewigged, Bothered and Bewildered
The Same Wavelength/Winning Isn't Everything/A Honeymoon for Horace
description: A psychic comes on board to entertain the passengers and she meets a man who's separated from his wife and is uncertain if he wants to remain with his wife. And a friend of Stubbing's comes on board with his son whom he doesn't see much of. And he can't help but boast of his son's accomplishments but the son later reveals to Vickie that's his accomplishments are not true. And an elderly couple who are engaged come on board and the guy is nervous about taking the plunge.

title: Command Performance/Hyde and Seek/Sketchy Love
description: A young girl who's infatuated with Gopher pretends to be her older sister. An artist meets a unhappily married guy. And the ship's comic runs into the wife and daughter he left years ago.

title: The Groupies/The Audition/Doc's Nephew
description: A psychiatrist who specializes in group therapy goes on board for a little vacation but one of his groups joins him. And they still want him to help them. And when two of them get attracted to each other, they don't know what to do. An actor runs into the writer of a soap who rejected him. And she wonders if he has something up his sleeve. And Doc's girlfriend joins him, as does his nephew and he makes a move on her. Prompting Doc to challenge him.

title: The Spoonmaker Diamond/Papa Doc/The Role Model/Julie's Tycoon: Part 1
The Spoonmaker Diamond/Papa Doc/The Role Model/Julie's Tycoon: Part 2
Best of Friends, The/Too Many Dads/Love Will Find a Way
description: It's Thanksgiving. Among the passengers is a woman who wants to introduce her fianc√© to her parents but she neglected to tell them that he's a paraplegic. And a father and his son are trying to get away from the boy's natural father who wants to take him away. And the crew is bickering with each other to the point that they're not speaking with each other.

title: The Man in the Iron Shorts/The Victims/Heavens to Betsy
Tomorrow Lady, The/Father, Dear Father/Still Life
Baby Talk/My Friend, the Executrix/Programmed for Love
The Christmas Presence
Paroled to Love/First Impressions/Love Finds Florence Nightingale
The Captain's Replacement/Sly as a Fox/Here Comes the Bride - Maybe
Doc's Big Case/Senior Sinners/A Booming Romance
Gopher's Daisy/Our Son, the Lawyer/Salvaged Romance
Isaac's Aegean Affair/The Captain and the Kid/Poor Rich Man/The Dean and the Flunkee: Part 1
description: The crew are in Greece working a cruise where a College is having its graduation ceremony. The Principal is attracted to a teacher who rebuffs him because he won't give a student a make-up test so he can graduate. And the student and a couple of his friends are hounding the Principal to do that. A prodigy is attracted to Julie which doesn't make the Captain happy. And the valedictorian whose education was provided by his Greek aunt whom he assumed is wealthy but upon meeting her learns she's just a woman of humble means. And when she goes on board he doesn't tell anyone he's her aunt. And Isaac meets a woman who is estranged from her husband.

title: Isaac's Aegean Affair/The Captain and the Kid/Poor Rich Man/The Dean and the Flunkee: Part 2
The Zinging Valentine/The Very Temporary Secretary/Final Score
The Captain's Crush/Out of My Hair/Off-Course Romance
I Like to Be in America/He Ain't Heavy/Abby's Maiden Voyage
description: April comes back after being let go by her employer and is trying to gain citizenship but always crumbles during the oral exam. One of the ship's waiters gets into it with one of the passengers and learns that they have a connection. And an inexperienced girl wants to have her first time and meets a guy but whenever they become intimate she breaks up killing the mood.

title: Vicki's Dilemma/Discount Romance/Looser & Still Champ
description: Vicki hooks up with a young passenger who gives her some pills that he told her are supplements. But when the boy gets ill and Doc deduces it's from drug use and when the pills are found on Vicki, the boy's mother accuses Vicki of giving her son the drugs. Gopher's uncle, a salesman, sets up a little shop in his cabin which undermines the ship's gift shop. And he takes a liking to the woman in charge of the shop, whose job could be in jeopardy because she's not making any sales. And a guy who's traveling with his girlfriend feels emasculated because she's better at the things he likes to do.

title: So Help Me Hannah/The Maid Cleans Up/C.P.R, I.O.U.
Going to the Dogs/Putting on the Dog/Women's Best Friend/Whose Dog Is It Anyway
description: On a cruise wherein there is dog contest to determine which dog will be on the cover of the dog food containers. A woman thinks that the dog belonging to another passenger is the dog she lost sometime ago. Isaac's Aunt Tanya enters her pet and is pampering him so much that her husband, Charles is feeling neglected. Gopher and Isaac get a dog and enter him in the contest but they have trouble training him or so they think. And the mail clerk from the dog food company goes on board to bring something to the President of the company but the President is not there and somehow people think he's the president.

title: The Professor Has Class/When the Magic Disappears/We, the Jury
Hits and Missus/Return of Annabelle/Just Plain Folks Medicine/Caught in the Act/The Real Thing/Do Not Disturb/Lulu & Kenny (Country Music Jamboree): Part 1
Hits and Missus/Return of Annabelle/Just Plain Folks Medicine/Caught in the Act/The Real Thing/Do Not Disturb/Lulu & Kenny (Country Music Jamboree): Part 2
Fountain of Youth/Bad Luck Cabin/Uncle Daddy
The Pledge/East Meets West/Dear Roberta/My Two Dumplings: Part 1
description: The crew goes to China to work on a cruise there. Among the passengers is a woman whose ill who while on shore meets a man, who tries to get on board but couldn't. But another passenger pulls a gun on him and slaps handcuffs on him. Doc meets a woman who has a little problem with the medical professionals. A woman who's trying to get over her marriage ending meets a guy who unknown to her or anyone writes the advice column, "Dear Roberta" whose advice was what led to her divorce. And a guy who's been juggling two girls has to deal with the two of them being on the cruise.

title: The Pledge/East Meets West/Dear Roberta/My Two Dumplings: Part 2
Bricker's Boy/Lotions of Love/The Hustlers
Youth Takes a Holiday/Don't Leave Home Without It/Prisoner of Love
description: A couple travels with their friend who brings his young girlfriend along. A retired cop learns that a young man who is a friend of Vicki's is a thief but for some reason doesn't turn him in. An Army officer on leave, looks for a man has her sights set on Gopher but when he refuses her overtures, she locks her cabin door and refuses to let him out.

title: Rhino of the Year/One Last Time/For Love or Money
Friend of the Family/Affair on Demand/Just Another Pretty Face
When Worlds Collide/The Captain and the Geisha/The Lottery Winners/The Emperor's Fortune: Part 1
When Worlds Collide/The Captain and the Geisha/The Lottery Winners/The Emperor's Fortune: Part 2
Long Time No See/Bear Essence/Kisses and Makeup
Julie and the Bachelor/Set-up for Romance/Intensive Care
The World's Greatest Kisser/Don't Take My Wife, Please/The Reluctant Father
Dee Dee's Dilemma/Julie's Blind Date/The Prize Winner
description: A woman who's being sought to testify in a messy divorce case sneaks on board disguised as a girl, and she finds herself hanging with a father and son. A guy whom Julis was set up with, is not exactly her type but before she could dump him , he dumps her which bruises her ego. An author who recently won a literary prize, goes on board with his wife and his assistant. It seems that the assistant knows that the book he wrote was not entirely written by him and is using it to coerce him into having an affair with her.

title: The Misunderstanding/Love Below Decks/The End Is Near
The Last Case/Looking for Mr. Wilson/Love on Strike
How Do I Love Thee?/No More Alimony/Authoress! Authoress!
Buck Stops Here, The/For Better or Worse/Bet on It
Aunt Emma, I Love You/Hoopla/The First Romance
Ace in the Hole/Uncle Joey's Song/Father in the Cradle
description: A photographer joins the crew and when all the girls throw themselves it makes the guys unhappy. The retired host of a children's show come son board and tries to help a traumatized boy. And a guy comes to meet his mother who just got married but is not happy that the guy she married is almost his age.

title: Polly's Poker Palace/Shop Ahoy/Double Date/The Hong Kong Affair/Two Tails of a City: Part 1
Polly's Poker Palace/Shop Ahoy/Double Date/The Hong Kong Affair/Two Tales of a City: Part 2

Vicki and the Fugitive/Lady in the Window/Stolen Years/Dutch Treat: Part 1
description: While on a cruise in the Netherlands, Vicki hooks up with a new crew member who is being sought by Interpol. A man who is with his wife, discovers his mistress is on the ship too. The Captain is taken with a woman who for some reason tries to keep him at bay. And a woman meets a man from her past who thinks she betrayed him but who doesn't remember her when they meet.

title: Vicki and the Fugitive/Lady in the Window/Stolen Years/Dutch Treat: Part 2

The Villa/The Racer's Edge/Love or Money/The Accident: Part 1
description: The crew is now in Germany. And among the passengers is a woman whose family estate was taken by a nemesis, who runs into an old flame. Doc meets a woman who's traveling with her brother who doesn't warm up to Doc. Later while they're out Doc hits a man who appears to be seriously injured. Two sisters who are looking to score a rich guy but when one of them is attracted to Ace, the other tries to sabotage the relationship. And biker who just got married and is retiring from competition is being courted by his coach who says he wants him to enter one last race so that the coach can get the job he's trying to get.

title: The Villa/The Racer's Edge/Love or Money/The Accident: Part 2

Hippies and Yuppies/Frat Wars/Return of the Lambdas
description: When a fraternity has the turnover of one of their relics from one chapter to another. The chapter whose going to receive feels the chapter whose in possession of it is not worthy to be part of the fraternity so the leader tries to make it appear that they violate several of the fraternity's laws so that they would thrown out. He even sends a girl to seduce and distract the leader of the other group, who seems to keep them in check. And two couples who were also in the fraternity 20 years ago and were hippies then, meet and while one of them are still hippies, the other one is now more yuppie, so they feel as if they don't have anything in common anymore.
